services.name: Basic Car Wash
services.description: Includes exterior washing, drying, and tire cleaning.

services.name: Full Service Detailing
services.description: Exterior and interior cleaning, waxing, and vacuuming.
services.availability: Appointment required, available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.

services.name: Interior Detailing
services.description: Comprehensive cleaning of seats, carpets, mats, and interior windows.
services.availability: Appointment required, available Monday to Saturday, 10 AM to 4 PM.

services.name: Exterior Detailing
services.description: High-quality washing, waxing, and polishing of the car's exterior.
services.availability: Appointment required, available Monday to Saturday, 10 AM to 4 PM.

services.name: Paint Protection
services.description: Application of protective coatings to preserve car paint.
services.availability: Appointment required, booking two weeks in advance recommended.

faqs.question: How long does a full service detailing take?
Do you offer any discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for repeat customers.

faqs.question: Can I book services online?
faqs.answer: Yes, services can be booked through our website.

faqs.question: Is there a cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations should be made at least 24 hours in advance.
